metadata.title: Bugfixes and QOL
metadata.author: CommunistMountain
metadata.description:
Requires Hyperspace. Major credit goes to the HS team for making many bugfixes/QOL possible.
See Github page for mod information. If what you see in-game does not match the advertised description, please submit an issue, or contact me on Reddit (CommunistMountain) or Discord (communistmountain, formerly CommunistMountain#0463).
